      • DataSet

        public DataSet(@Nonnull
               String name,
               @Nonnull
               StaticDataSource train,
               @Nullable
               StaticDataSource query,
               @Nonnull
               StaticDataSource test,
               @Nonnull
               UUID grp,
               Map<String,Object> attrs)

        Create a new data set.

        Parameters:
        name - The name.
        train - The training source.
        query - The query source (if any).
        test - The test data source.
        grp - The data set isolation group.
        attrs - The data set attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        @Nonnull
public String getName()

        Get the data set name.

        Returns:
        A name for the data set. Used in the output file.

      • getAttributes

        public Map<String,Object> getAttributes()

        Get the data set attributes (used for identification in output).

        Returns:
        A key → value map of the attributes used to identify this data set. For example, a crossfold data set may include the source name and fold number.

      • getIsolationGroup

        public UUID getIsolationGroup()

        Get the isolation group ID for this data set. Data sets in the same group will be allowed to run in parallel. This is used to implement data set isolation.

        Returns:
        The group ID for this data set.

      • getTestData

        @Nonnull
public StaticDataSource getTestData()

        Get the training data.

        Returns:
        A data source containing the test data.

      • getTrainingData

public StaticDataSource getTrainingData()

        Get the training data.

        Returns:
        A data source containing the training data.

      • getQueryData

        @Nullable
public StaticDataSource getQueryData()

        Get the query data.

        Returns:
        A data source containing the query data.

      • getAllItems

        public LongSet getAllItems()

      • configure

        public void configure(LenskitConfiguration config)

        Configure LensKit to have the training data from this data source.

        Parameters:
        config - A configuration in which the training data for this data set should be configured.
